dmca.title: Unauthorized Use Of Properties -www.riotvideo.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Andy Coombs [mailto:andy@coombspc.com] 
Posted At: Monday, June 26, 2006 9:30 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Unauthorized Use Of Properties -www.riotvideo.com
Subject: Re: Unauthorized Use Of Properties -www.riotvideo.com



                                                June 26, 2006 


Via Certified Mail 
Facsimile and Email: 
(214) 782-7756 
legal-response@theplanet.com <mailto:Dmca@ev1.net>  

Mr. George Poletes 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 Stemmons Fwy., Ste. 110 
Dallas, Texas, 75207 

        Re: Unauthorized Use Of Properties -www.riotvideo.com
<file://www.riotvideo.com>  

Dear Mr. Poletes: 

        I certify under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of
the owners of exclusive rights that have been infringed on pages posted by
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. I am sending this notification on the
basis of a good faith belief that www.riotvideo.com
<file://www.riotvideo.com>  includes infringing video clips that are not
authorized by the Copyright Owners, their agents or the law. Please act
expeditiously to remove or disable access to the infringing materials
described below:

Owner of the copyrighted works: Disney Enterprises, Inc., and Disney's subsidiary,
American Broadcasting Company, Inc. (collectively "Disney").

 

Copyrighted works infringed upon:       Infringing items include but are not limited
to: 

                http://www.riotvideo.com/Dog_gets_owned.html
<http://www.riotvideo.com/Dog_gets_owned.html> 

                (Dog and Goat)

                http://www.riotvideo.com/Porto_Potty_Tipped_On_Construction_Site.html
<http://www.riotvideo.com/Porto_Potty_Tipped_On_Construction_Site.html>  

                (Porto Potty tip) 

                http://www.riotvideo.com/Speedo_Man_falls_on_Bikini_Girl.html
<http://www.riotvideo.com/Speedo_Man_falls_on_Bikini_Girl.html> 

                (Speedo man fall on butt)



I may be contacted at: 

J. Andrew Coombs, A Prof. Corp.

450 N. Brand Blvd., Suite 600

Glendale, California 91203-2349

Telephone:  (818) 291-6447

Facsimile:  (818) 291-6446

The foregoing is sent to you as the Internet Service Provider and in the form
